links.title: Tesla Stock As An Investment 2018
links.description: Tesla Stock can rally significantly higher, but Tesla is currently a battleground stock. There is an on going battle between billionaire's and a massive $12 billion dollar short position in Tesla. So far short sellers have been completely wrong and they have had their accounts blown up :) Where do you think Tesla stock is headed?

messages.body: $TSLA lame stream not main stream http://money.cnn.com/2018/01/11/technology/tesla-model-3-review/index.html

links.title: I drove the Tesla Model 3 and it's not 'mainstream'
links.description: I spent a day or so driving a Model 3 rented through Turo, the peer-to-peer car rental company. It's a handsome car that's fun to drive, but the Model 3 is definitely not mainstream. It feels like a Silicon Valley car designed for Silicon Valley people.

messages.body: $TSLA Tesla’s Giant South Australia Battery Had an Incredible First Month https://www.inverse.com/article/40117-elon-musk-tesla-south-australia-battery

links.title: Tesla's Giant South Australia Battery Had an Incredible First Month
links.description: The results are in: Tesla's South Australian project, touted as the world's largest lithium-ion battery with enough energy to power 30,000 homes, had an astonishing first month of operation. The 100-megawatt behemoth, originally conceived by Elon Musk through a bet over Twitter, has inspired the states of Queensland and Victoria to follow suit with their own projects.

links.title: Elon Musk confirms he was at an alleged Silicon Valley 'sex party' until 1 a.m. - but he says he thought it was a costume party and left early
links.description: Elon Musk attended a now notorious Silicon Valley event that has been called a "sex party," his representative told Business Insider. But Musk insists he thought it was a "corporate" party with a costume theme and saw no sign of sex when he left at 1 a.m.
